item.title: What Buisness Intelligence class taught me?
item.description: Data is the new oil. Unfortunately, the technology has evolved faster than the workforce skills to make sense of it, and organizations across sectors must adapt to this new reality or perish Andreas Weigend, Head of Stanfordâ€™s Social Data Lab and former Chief Scientist at Amazon I Understand the trends in BI are changing. Business Intelligence has revolutionized and will continue to do so. Five BI trends which will rule BI landscape:
